column4: I turn my server on today and it no longer accepts my passphrase to mount the system
can someone please help me
live cd also denies passphrase
I'm really disappointed that it takes losing all my files to realize just how unreliable ubuntu is as an OS
How did you lose your files?
the file system won't load
lol, that definitely makes Ubuntu a bad OS, lol.
yeah it makes it a miserable os
You had the entire drive encrypted?
I don't see how you would lose everything.
Have you tried mounting the drive on a livecd?
Try doing it manually.
thanks will try I'm sorry I'm just very frustrated and at the point of tears
cryptsetup luksOpen /dev/sda2 LUKS
Change the /dev/sda2 to whatever the drive is.
k bbiab thank you
Then mount that
mount /dev/mapper/LUKS /mnt
Hop on IRC while on the livecd
I'm in, I absolutely love you
^^ Not sure what may have caused that.
there was a power outage possibly somthing got corrupted
Ahh, that could do it. I recommend you backup your headers.
I'm backing up first thing :) and thank you once again
